events.title: The Morning Shift
events.text_stub: Your shift starts in an hour. The commute will cost time, but the pay keeps the bills in check.

choices.text: Go in and power through the shift.
Skip work to handle other responsibilities.

events.title: Rent Is Due
events.text_stub: Your landlord is expecting payment. The deadline is today, and the ledger doesn't lie.

choices.text: Pay the rent and reset the clock.
Delay the payment and take on a penalty.

events.title: Relationship Check-In
events.text_stub: Someone close needs time and reassurance. Letting it slide could create distance.

choices.text: Be there and reconnect.
Miss the meeting and promise to make it up later.

events.title: A Better Offer
events.text_stub: A recruiter calls with a new role that could put your career on a faster track, but it comes with longer hours.

choices.text: Take the offer and reset your priorities.
Stay where you are and protect your balance.

events.title: Deadline Crunch
events.text_stub: Your team is behind schedule. Picking up extra work could stabilize your position, but it will drain you.

choices.text: Lean in and carry the workload.
Protect your energy and set limits.

events.title: Side Gig Opportunity
events.text_stub: A freelance offer arrives. It could add income and contacts, but it will eat into your nights.

choices.text: Take the gig and expand your reach.
Decline and keep your evenings clear.

events.title: Call in a Favor
events.text_stub: A friend asks for help with a delicate situation. Showing up could deepen the bond, but it may expose you.

choices.text: Offer help and keep it discreet.
Politely decline and focus on your own load.

events.title: Trust Test
events.text_stub: A close contact needs to know if they can rely on you. The answer shapes how deep the relationship goes.

choices.text: Share more than usual.
Hold your cards close.

events.title: Community Meeting
events.text_stub: Neighbors gather to discuss safety and resources. Your presence could unlock new access, or it could be a time sink.

choices.text: Attend and volunteer for follow-up.
Skip it and keep your schedule open.

events.title: Civic Protest
events.text_stub: A peaceful protest gains momentum downtown. Joining could raise your profile and shape policy.

choices.text: Join the march and speak up.
Support from a distance.

events.title: Safehouse Tip
events.text_stub: A trusted neighbor offers a safe place to lay low if needed. It could reduce risk but also adds another obligation.

choices.text: Accept the offer and set ground rules.
Decline to keep things simple.
